ygData.subject: Dragoon/OOC
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I ll be gone for two weeks.  Stuff.  Ack.  Most of my characters aren t doing anything right now.  I m leaving Dragoon with Legendary Nemasis.  And Airly

OOC: I'll be gone for two weeks.  Stuff.  Ack.  Most of my characters aren't 
doing anything right now.  I'm leaving Dragoon with Legendary Nemasis.  And 
Airly can use Ender if she needs or wants to.

::Dragoon::
       He finds his arch on his own.  He walks in and looks around.  "Hey!  
We've got spectators?  Let's give 'em a show."  He starts moving aimlessly 
around the room letting minute amounts of energy out of his fingertips, 
creating, in essence, a light show.

--part1_84.196b7639.28957cf7_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
